@charset "utf-8";
@import "classes";

/**
 * @module animate
 * @class fade
 * @description 定义淡入动画
 * @method fade-in
 */
@-webkit-keyframes fade-in {
	0% {
		opacity: 0;
	}
	100% {
		opacity: 1;
	}
}
@keyframes fade-in {
	0% {
		opacity: 0;
	}
	100% {
		opacity: 1;
	}
}

.ani.fade-in {
	-webkit-animation-name: fade-in;
	animation-name: fade-in;
}
